page.title: 12VILLAGERS
page.content: We interviewed a number of villagers (a person who has lived in the same village nearly all of their life). We found out that paper,milk and bread are delivered to them. There are no shops in the area-only a mobile van. There is no other entertainment in the area other than fetes, barn dances and bands.In the winter there is a whist drive once a fortnight.It would be handy for the people who have not got a car to have one because it is such a long way to go to get to a shop.Some would like to see more children around the area. The only thing is, if there were more childeren there would not be anything for them to play on as there aren't any parks around. At home when there is nothing to do they have to make up their own entertainment. Mr.French is an ex_racing driver.
